author: Flame442
install_msg:
Thanks for installing partygames. Use `[p]help partygames` for more info.
This cog comes with bundled data.
name: PartyGames
short: Chat games focused on coming up with words from 3 letters.
description: Chat games focused on coming up with words from 3 letters. Contains gamemodes for writing a word the fastest, writing the longest word, writing the most words, or being able to keep writing words without getting three strikes. Run [p]partygames to play!
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store user data.
